name: Wedding Punk - Demo
description:
Your sister is getting married to a Mafia man. You know the Mafia, and don't trust them, so you don't trust your future brother-in-law who is a Mafia man. So, your job, shall you choose to accept it, is to infiltrate the wedding centre and stop your sister from becoming one half of the Mafia. Sounds good, innit?

Oh, and you are a rebel punk. Your friends hate the Mafia. Your dad is no punk, but he hates the Mafia just as much. Sounds fair, innit?
